title: Bot Networks (DEPLOY_BOTS)
didYouKnow: Nearly half of all Twitter accounts tweeting about COVID-19 in early 2020 were likely automated bots, showing how large-scale botnets can dominate online debate before most people notice.

references.title: Researchers: Nearly Half Of Accounts Tweeting About Coronavirus Are Likely Bots
references.summary: A Carnegie Mellon study found about 45 % of Twitter accounts discussing COVID-19 were bots that amplified more than 100 false narratives, from 5G hoaxes to bioweapon rumors.

references.title: A Russian Bot Farm Used AI to Lie to Americans. What Now?

references.title: Oxford study finds social media manipulation in all 81 countries surveyed
references.summary: Oxford researchers documented state-backed ‘cyber-troop’ bot or troll campaigns in every country studied; Facebook and Twitter removed more than 317,000 fake accounts linked to these ops in 22 months.

title: Meme Campaigns (ESTABLISH_MEMES)

references.title: How Russian Trolls Used Meme Warfare to Divide America

references.title: How memes became health disinformation super-spreaders

references.title: AI memes: Election disinformation manifested through satire
references.summary: Policy experts warn AI-generated political memes are already shaping 2024 campaigns, using humor and pop-culture mash-ups to slip past both users’ skepticism and platform moderation.

references.title: Partisan news sites outnumber local daily newspapers

references.title: How Russia covertly hired U.S. influencers to create videos

references.title: How Instagram influencers profit from anti-vaccine misinformation

references.title: How the Chinese government fabricates social media posts for strategic distraction

references.title: Study That Linked Vaccine and Autism Was ‘Fraudulent’

references.title: Covid-19: Lancet retracts paper that halted hydroxychloroquine trials

references.title: ‘Stop the Steal’ movement and January 6 (Congressional Report)

references.title: Data Voids: Where Missing Facts Lead to Disinformation

references.title: Ottawa trucker convoy galvanizes far-right worldwide

references.title: EU silences Russian state media: a step in the wrong direction?
